6 std::string topicString(const std::string& topic, bool keep_slashes, char legal_first, char legal_char)
7 {
8  std::string ret = topic;
9  for(int i = 0; i < ret.size(); i++)
10  if(!(std::isalnum(ret[i]) || ret[i] == '_' || (ret[i] == '/' && keep_slashes)))
11  ret[i] = legal_char;
13  if(!(std::isalpha(ret[0]) || ret[0] == '/'))
14  ret = legal_first+ret;
15  return ret;
16 }
